person.persName: Hugh Blair Wilson (Ohio and Missouri, lawyer and soldier)

body.p: Ohio and Missouri, teacher, lawyer, and soldier. Ohio native. Son of Nancy Wilson. Married to Elizabeth McCreight Wilson on May 17, 1853. Married to Elizabeth Augusta Frye on November 1, 1859. Teacher in Bethel, Ohio in 1850. Lawyer in Ironton, Missouri in 1860. Served in the 44th Ohio Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as lieutenant colonel from September 5, 1861 to April 9, 1863.
